channel.title: Play Project Insanity on Windows XP
channel.description: I want to run the client on windows xp

item.title: Play Project Insanity on Windows XP
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

CLASSPATH: C:Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0\bin;%CLASSPATH%;|
PATH: C:Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0\bin

yeah my jdk is shitty cant upgrade on this netbook

Anything wrong with em?

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) java.security.AccessController.doPriviliged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit.
thats the run error

Read full topic
